Maternal readmissions: There was no evidence of association between the time of discharge 
and maternal readmission for morbidity. The only RCT that evaluated this outcome 
showed no difference in risk of maternal readmission among women discharged within 
24 hours or at a later time (RR=0.82, 95% CI 0.22 to 2.99) (3). Pooled analysis of the two 
cohort studies also showed no effect on the risk of maternal readmission (RR=1.38, 95% 
CI 0.06 to 32.6). The overall
